---
title: torchgnn
format: gfm
---

Graph Neural Networks for [`{torch}`](https://mlverse.github.io/torch/) in R.


## Installation

Install the development version of the package using

```{r, eval = FALSE}
pak::pak("josiahparry/torchgnn")
```


## Usage

Use `gcn_model()` to create a high level model:

```{r}
library(torchgnn)

gcn_model(
  in_features = 14,
  hidden_dims = c(56, 56),
  out_features = 1,
  output_activation = torch::nnf_sigmoid
)
```

Or create individual layers using `gcn_layer()`:

```{r}
gcn_layer(10, 1)
```
